attributes.action: Cancel the contract with ETS, the company responsible for the shambles when marking our children's SAT results
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a mother of a Year 9 son and a Year 6 daughter who have sat SAT's exams this year. The company has firstly failed to return the results on time and secondly and more importantly appear to have made mistakes when hastily marking the tests.  The government should cancel the contract immediately and inform the schools not to acknowledge the results as they may be incorrect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
